    • Method Detail

      • createShortestPathTo

        public int createShortestPathTo​(int start_date,
                                Case end,
                                Carte carte,
                                Simulateur sim,
                                SimpleChefPompier chef)
        Description copied from class: Robot
        Needs to be implemented by every robot, make sure to only create new path when robot stopped moving indicated by the bool notMoving and to set notMoving to false when a path was created. This function is responsible that the robots only move as allowed
        Specified by:
        createShortestPathTo in class Robot
        end - target Case
        carte - map on which the robot operates
        sim - reference to the simulateur that receives the deplacer events
        Returns:
        returns duration it takes the robot to move from current position to target
